Title: TimerLight
Description:
Timerlight is a timer control reference in Silverlight. The control and Timer Component (in Windows Form Applications and ASP.NET apps) are same control..
Incule Interval property, Start function,Stop function and Tick event.. That is it..

Kaan BAŞLI - www.kaanbasli.com
